title: Person of Interest Finch vs Special Councel
author: George Finch
comment:
Special Counsel: "If they don't start up again, the country is defenceless"
Finch: "No, just less well defended.."

BOOM!

Finch doesn’t often get the chance to be really boss... but this, this is one of them. The pure distain/anger in his voice when he says “you gave my friend your word” is so perfectly done. Props to the writers and to the actor. Just a great scene!!

Special Counsel: “I give you my word...”
Finch: “Your word ain’t worth shit.” 😎
The soundtrack was one of the most memorable aspects of the show, that along with the relationship between finch machine and Reese

I can't blame Shaw or Finch for not trusting Control. They killed Finch's friend Nathan after he gave them the Machine and they also killed Cole, Shaw's boyfriend. No one can blame either of them for not trusting Control.
description: Person of Interest. Harorld Finch confronts Special Councel.I own none of this so don't sue me
